sys_documentation.label: *** Have you been convicted, imprisoned, on probation or parole in last 7 years?

sys_documentation.hint: Include felonies, firearms or explosives violations, misdemeanors, and all other offenses. If 'YES', use space below to provide the date, explanation of the violation, place of occurrence and the name and address of the police department or court involved.
